books.author: Chinua Achebe
books.title: Things Fall Apart
books.description: The first novel by Nigerian author Chinua Achebe, published in 1958. It is the most widely read book in modern African literature. The story chronicles pre-colonial life in the south-eastern part of Nigeria and the arrival of the Europeans during the late 19th century.
